models.name: BMW M2 CS
models.technical specifications: 3.0L inline-6 twin-turbo engine, 530 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.8s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €15,000
models.interesting facts: Tracks-focused edition of the M2 with 30kg weight reduction and upgraded carbon-fibre body panels

models.name: BMW M3 Competition
models.technical specifications: 3.0L inline-6 twin-turbo engine, 510 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.9s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €15,000
models.interesting facts: Features a carbon-fibre roof, 650 Nm of torque and is available in both RWD and xDrive variants

models.name: BMW M5 CS
models.technical specifications: 4.4L twin-turbo V8 engine, 635 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.0s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €25,000
models.interesting facts: Most powerful production BMW M car ever at launch; weight reduced 70kg vs M5 Competition; features carbon fibre bodywork and exclusive Gold Bronze trim accents

models.name: Audi R8
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international driving licence, security deposit €20,000
models.interesting facts: Naturally aspirated V10 mid-engine layout; production version of a car developed with motorsport DNA and reaches over 330km/h

models.name: Audi RS3 ABT
models.technical specifications: 2.5L five-cyl turbo engine, 500 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €12,000
models.interesting facts: Prepared by ABT Sportsline to increase the stock RS3 power up to 500HP with upgraded intercooler, exhaust and aero kit; limited edition in many markets.

models.name: Audi RS Q8 Performance
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 640 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.6s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €30,000
models.interesting facts: Most powerful combustion-engine SUV from Audi Sport; set a Nürburgring Nordschleife lap of 7:36.698 for production SUVs

models.name: Mercedes-AMG GTR bs
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 720 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.2sh
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €50,000
models.interesting facts: Most extreme road-going AMG to date, with track-derived aerodynamics, over 800Nm of torque and only ~1,615kg kerb weight

models.name: Mercedes-AMG ONE
models.technical specifications: 1.6L V6 turbo + hybrid system, 1,063 HP, 0-100 km/h in 2.9s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €500,000
models.interesting facts: Formula 1 derived powertrain, only 275 units planned, active aerodynamics with DRS and push-rod suspension

models.name: Mercedes-AMG G63 Mansory
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine (tuned), 850 HP, 0-100 km/h in 4.5s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €80,000
models.interesting facts: Limited-edition Mansory conversion of the G-Class; only 10 units built with 1,000 Nm torque and full carbon wide-body kit

models.name: Cullinan
models.technical specifications: 6.75L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 hp, 0-100 km/h in 5.2 s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving license, €15,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The suspension system uses cameras and sensors to read the road ahead and smooth out bumps before you hit them. The ride is tuned to feel like you are gliding.

models.name: Phantom
models.technical specifications: 6.75L twin-turbo V12 engine, 563 HP, 0-100 km/h in 5.1s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €100,000
models.interesting facts: Hand-built at Goodwood with over 44,000 exterior paint colour options and bespoke craftsmanship throughout

models.name: Wraith
models.technical specifications: 6.6L V12 twin-turbo engine, 624 HP, 0-100 km/h in 4.6s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving license, €20,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: Most powerful production Rolls-Royce at its launch; debuted with 'Satellite-Aided Transmission' using GPS to pre-select gears
